Title: Neuronal Pentraxin 2 predicts medial temporal atrophy and memory decline across the Alzheimer's disease spectrum
Brief summary of findings related to NPT: NPTX2 levels were found to be predictive of medial temporal atrophy and memory decline in Alzheimer's disease.

Title: NPTX2 and cognitive dysfunction in Alzheimerâ€™s Disease
Brief summary of findings related to NPT: Study found lower levels of NPTX2 in cerebrospinal fluid of Alzheimer's patients, which correlated with cognitive impairment.

Title: NPTX2 is an important player in the hippocampal synaptic dysfunction of APP/PS1 mice
Brief summary of findings related to NPT: NPTX2 was found to be significantly decreased in the hippocampus of APP/PS1 mice, a model of Alzheimer's disease, and its overexpression improved synaptic function.

Title: NPTX2 inhibits neuronal apoptosis and neuroinflammation in Parkinson's disease model
Brief summary of findings related to NPT: NPTX2 was found to inhibit neuronal apoptosis and neuroinflammation in a rat model of Parkinson's disease.

Title: Neuronal Pentraxin 2 deletion enhances neuropathic pain due to sciatic nerve injury
Brief summary of findings related to NPT: NPTX2 was found to play a role in neuropathic pain, with its deletion enhancing pain responses in a mouse model of sciatic nerve injury.

Title: NPTX2 promotes epileptogenesis in temporal lobe epilepsy
Brief summary of findings related to NPT: NPTX2 was found to promote epileptogenesis in a rat model of temporal lobe epilepsy, suggesting a potential role in epilepsy pathology.
